title: The Secret Ingredient
description: THE SECRET INGREDIENTDish created by Stewart LewisServes: hungry readers everywherePrep time: 0 minutesTotal time: 1-2 sittingsRecommended equipment: quiet, a cozy spot to curl up in, tasty snacksINGREDIENTS1 dash girl, Olivia, sixteen2 dollops loving dads, Bell and Enrique3 fistfuls guitar-playing older brother, Jeremy1 pint-size British best friend, Lola5 gallons family trouble1/2 smidgen warning, from a psychic on an elevator4 pounds vintage cookbook, with notes from the past1 search, kneaded, for a mother never known2 hints hope (a key and a name)3/4 pinch romance, with a cute boy named TheoDIRECTIONSPit life as you know it.Marinate in summertime.Add the secret ingredient.Serve with love in Silverlake, Los Angeles.
author: Stewart  Lewis
